mapper.sql: id id, PARENT_ID parentId, TYPE type,COMMENTATOR commentator,GMT_CREATE gmtCreate,GMT_MODIFIED gmtModified,LIKE_COUNT likkeCount,CONTENT content,COMMENT_COUNT commentCount,to_id toId
mapper.select: select c.ID,c.PARENT_ID,c.TYPE,c.COMMENTATOR,c.GMT_CREATE,c.GMT_MODIFIED,c.LIKE_COUNT,c.CONTENT,c.COMMENT_COUNT, (select name from user where user.id = c.to_id) as toName, u.NAME uNAME,u.ACCOUNT_ID,u.TOKEN,u.GMT_CREATE uGmtCreate,u.GMT_MODIFIED uGmtModified,u.AVATAR_URL,d.status dStatus from COMMENT c left join USER u on u.ID = c.COMMENTATOR left join dianzan d on d.comment_id = c.id where c.PARENT_ID = #{parentId} and c.TYPE = #{type} order by ID desc
